info.name: Lost Temples
info.attribution:
The room layout and game design is by LawDawg96 and released to the Public Domain by CC0. The wood grain background and board backgrounds (water, beach, grass) are available under the Pixabay License and are available at: https://pixabay.com/photos/water-sea-background-texture-1029842/ https://pixabay.com/photos/sand-texture-beach-summer-4432101/ https://pixabay.com/photos/lawn-grass-artificial-grass-green-1846813/ https://pixabay.com/photos/wood-structure-fund-nature-grain-186304/ The jungle image used on the tiles is available under the Pexels License and is available at: https://www.pexels.com/photo/lush-palm-trees-growing-in-tropical-forest-4669542/ The various icons are available under CC BY 3.0 as follows: - By delapouite (grass, temple, statute, skull, gem): https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/high-grass.html https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/mayan-pyramid.html https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/colombian-statue.html https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/calavera.html https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/rupee.html - By lorc (diamond, chalice): https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/cut-diamond.html https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/jeweled-chalice.html - By faithtoken (gold ore): https://game-icons.net/1x1/faithtoken/ore.html

Library image generated using the Midjourney artificial intelligence image generator, https://www.midjourney.com/home/, using the following prompt: "lost Mayan temples painting --ar 1:! --v 5.1"
info.description: Tile-laying race game. Players start with identical empty boards and each place the same piece and move tokens to be the first to reach temples and collect treasure. Player with most points wins.
info.helpText: Players take seats. (A player that wants to change playerColor, must leave the seat and return for the new color to take effect.)  Press play in lower left corner. An option is provided to randomly distribute starting pieces. If pieces not moved randomly, players manually move temples to letters and explorers to numbers on board. Press blue next card button in lower left which will appear only when time for another card. Each player moves card to their board. Move treasure pieces, diamonds, and gold, to the loot area for the collecting player for automatic score keeping. Peek at another player’s board by pressing buttons along bottom. Player’s currently peeking at your board are displayed next to eye icon at top.

fields.text: You are about to start a new game.  Press 'Go' to continue or 'Cancel' to exit.

fields.label: Toggle the switch to move temples and explorers to random starting positions.
